channel.title: Quest rewards?

item.title: Quest rewards?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

i just got done makeing my first quest on me server -clap clap-
but the total qp is mest up?
on the completed quest interface the total quest points keeps going up by 3?

heres the method im useing

[code]public void showQuestCompleted(String questName, int rewardqp) {
totalqp += rewardqp;
showInterface(297);
sendQuest(“Congratulations!”, 299);
sendQuest(“Close Window”, 300);
sendQuest(“You are awarded”, 6156);
sendQuest("Earned QP: "+rewardqp, 6158);
sendQuest(“Total QP: “+totalqp, 303);
sendQuest(“You have completed “+questName, 301);
sendQuest(””, 4444);
sendQuest(””, 304);

}[/code]

anyone have any ideas?
and it also wont let me cancel out of it

Read full topic
